resources.string: Ad-Blocking detected. It would be appreciated to allow AdMob to pass through for this application to work. After all, the developer has put in their time into this application so please help the developer by tapping on the adverts - Thanks! If you complain about it, fine, by all means do so! BUT do not post negative reviews or ratings as a result of using Ad-Blocking software!
No network detected. Please activate your network connection to allow AdMob to function properly. Thank you.
Please activate your network connection to allow AdMob to function properly. Thank you.\n\nThe application will end upon dismissal of the \'Ok\' button.
If Adblock is installed - scrolling appears!
